techmeme.title: Survey: US employees who use AI at work at least a few times per year rises from 21% in 2023 to 40% in 2025, and 19% report frequently using AI, up from 11% (Ryan Pendell/Gallup)
German defense tech startup Helsing raised €600M led by Daniel Ek's Prima Materia, sources say at a €12B valuation, bringing its total funding to €1.37B (Financial Times)
Amazon plans to hold Prime Day 2025 from July 8 until July 11, lasting four days instead of the usual two and open to Prime members, starting at 3AM ET (Cameron Faulkner/The Verge)
TheMinerMag: the median bitcoin mining cost is set to rise 9.4% QoQ in Q2 2025 to $70K, up from $52K in Q4 2024, squeezing margins for less efficient miners (Brayden Lindrea/Cointelegraph)
Sources: OpenAI wants Microsoft to take a ~33% stake in exchange for giving up future profit rights, and seeks to revise its exclusive cloud deal with Microsoft (The Information)
